name: proagent-data
description: Provectus Data practice plugin for data pipeline engineering, analytics, data warehousing, dbt transformations, SQL optimization, data quality, schema design, and exploratory data analysis across PostgreSQL, Snowflake, BigQuery, and Spark.
author: Provectus

skills.name: data-assistant
skills.description: Engineering Data Pipelines & Analytics - ETL/ELT, dbt transformations, data warehousing, SQL optimization, Airflow orchestration, Spark processing, data quality, and data modeling

agents.name: data-specialist
agents.description: Senior data engineer specializing in pipeline architecture, dbt analytics engineering, SQL optimization, data warehouse design, data quality frameworks, and analytics across PostgreSQL, Snowflake, BigQuery, and Spark

commands.name: proagent-data-hub
commands.description: Data practice hub - overview of capabilities and available operations

commands.name: proagent-data-run
commands.description: Execute data operations: build-pipeline, design-schema, optimize-queries, setup-warehouse, data-quality-check

commands.name: proagent-data-review
commands.description: Review data pipelines, schemas, query performance, data quality, and dbt projects

hooks.description: Schema validation and SQL linting before database operations
